description.zh-cn: 法国政治人物，复兴党成员，现任法国总理。
description.en: French politician, member of the Renaissance party, currently serving as the Prime Minister of France.

description.zh-cn: 法国政治人物，时任法国总统，任命塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼为总理。
description.en: French politician, then President of France, who appointed Sébastien Lecornu as Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 法国政治人物，塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼的前任法国总理。
description.en: French politician, predecessor of Sébastien Lecornu as Prime Minister of France.

description.zh-cn: 法国政治人物，在法国国防部长职位上与塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼有前后任关系。
description.en: French politician, who preceded and succeeded Sébastien Lecornu as Minister of the Armed Forces of France.

description.zh-cn: 法国政治人物，塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼的继任法国国防部长。
description.en: French politician, successor to Sébastien Lecornu as Minister of the Armed Forces of France.

description.zh-cn: 法国政治人物，曾任法国总理。塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼在其任内担任国防部长。
description.en: French politician, former Prime Minister of France. Sébastien Lecornu served as Minister of the Armed Forces during her tenure.

description.zh-cn: 法国政治人物，曾任法国总理。塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼在其任内担任国防部长。
description.en: French politician, former Prime Minister of France. Sébastien Lecornu served as Minister of the Armed Forces during his tenure.

description.zh-cn: 法国政治人物，曾任法国总理。塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼在其任内担任国防部长。
description.en: French politician, former Prime Minister of France. Sébastien Lecornu served as Minister of the Armed Forces during his tenure.

description.zh-cn: 法国政治人物，塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼的前任法国国防部长。
description.en: French politician, predecessor of Sébastien Lecornu as Minister of the Armed Forces of France.

description.zh-cn: 法国政治人物，曾任法国总理。塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼在其任内担任海外部长。
description.en: French politician, former Prime Minister of France. Sébastien Lecornu served as Minister of Overseas France during his tenure.

description.zh-cn: 法国政治人物，塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼的前任法国海外部长。
description.en: French politician, predecessor of Sébastien Lecornu as Minister of Overseas France.

description.zh-cn: 法国政治人物，塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼的继任法国海外部长。
description.en: French politician, successor to Sébastien Lecornu as Minister of Overseas France.

description.zh-cn: 法国政治人物，曾任法国总理。塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼在其任内担任领土发展部长及生态部国务卿。
description.en: French politician, former Prime Minister of France. Sébastien Lecornu served as Minister of Territorial Development and Secretary of State for Ecology during his tenure.

description.zh-cn: 法国政治人物，塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼的前任法国领土发展部长。
description.en: French politician, predecessor of Sébastien Lecornu as Minister of Territorial Development of France.

description.zh-cn: 法国政治人物，塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼的继任法国领土发展部长。
description.en: French politician, successor to Sébastien Lecornu as Minister of Territorial Development of France.

description.zh-cn: 法国政治人物，塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼的继任法国生态转型与国土协调部国务卿。
description.en: French politician, successor to Sébastien Lecornu as Secretary of State to the Minister for the Ecological and Inclusive Transition.

description.zh-cn: 法国政治人物，塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼的前任厄尔省省议会主席。
description.en: French politician, predecessor of Sébastien Lecornu as President of the Departmental Council of Eure.

description.zh-cn: 法国政治人物，塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼的继任厄尔省省议会主席。
description.en: French politician, successor to Sébastien Lecornu as President of the Departmental Council of Eure.

description.zh-cn: 法国政治人物，塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼的前任韦尔农市长。
description.en: French politician, predecessor of Sébastien Lecornu as Mayor of Vernon.

description.zh-cn: 法国政治人物，塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼的继任韦尔农市长。
description.en: French politician, successor to Sébastien Lecornu as Mayor of Vernon.

description.zh-cn: 法国法兰西岛瓦兹河谷省的市镇，塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼的出生地。
description.en: A commune in the Val-d'Oise department in Île-de-France, birthplace of Sébastien Lecornu.

nodes.id: 巴黎先贤祠-阿萨斯大学

zh-cn: 巴黎先贤祠-阿萨斯大学

description.zh-cn: 位于法国巴黎的大学，塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼的母校。
description.en: A university in Paris, France, the alma mater of Sébastien Lecornu.

description.zh-cn: 法国的一个中间派自由主义政党，由埃马纽埃尔·马克龙于2016年创立。塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼于2017年加入。
description.en: A centrist and liberal political party in France, founded by Emmanuel Macron in 2016. Sébastien Lecornu joined in 2017.

description.zh-cn: 法国的一个中右翼政党，是共和党的前身。塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼曾是其成员。
description.en: A centre-right political party in France, predecessor to The Republicans. Sébastien Lecornu was a member.

description.zh-cn: 法国的一个中右翼政党。塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼曾是其成员。
description.en: A centre-right political party in France. Sébastien Lecornu was a member.

description.zh-cn: 法国厄尔省的地方议会。塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼曾担任其主席。
description.en: The local deliberative assembly of the Eure department in France. Sébastien Lecornu served as its president.

description.zh-cn: 法国议会的下议院。
description.en: The lower house of the French Parliament.

description.zh-cn: 法国国民议会针对总理塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼提出的不信任动议。
description.en: A motion of no confidence against Prime Minister Sébastien Lecornu in the French National Assembly.

description.zh-cn: 东欧国家。
description.en: A country in Eastern Europe.

description.zh-cn: 塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼于1986年6月11日出生于法国欧博讷。
description.en: Sébastien Lecornu was born in Eaubonne, France on June 11, 1986.

relationships.target: 巴黎先贤祠-阿萨斯大学

description.zh-cn: 塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼毕业于巴黎先贤祠-阿萨斯大学。
description.en: Sébastien Lecornu is an alumnus of Panthéon-Assas University.

description.zh-cn: 塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼自2017年起为复兴党（前身为共和国前进！）成员。
description.en: Sébastien Lecornu has been a member of Renaissance (formerly La République En Marche!) since 2017.

description.zh-cn: 塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼于2015年至2017年间为共和党成员。
description.en: Sébastien Lecornu was a member of The Republicans from 2015 to 2017.

description.zh-cn: 塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼于2002年至2015年间为人民运动联盟成员。
description.en: Sébastien Lecornu was a member of the Union for a Popular Movement from 2002 to 2015.

description.zh-cn: 时任法国总统埃马纽埃尔·马克龙任命塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼为新任总理。
description.en: Then-President of France Emmanuel Macron appointed Sébastien Lecornu as the new Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 在塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼短暂辞职后，总统埃马纽埃尔·马克龙再次任命其为总理。
description.en: After Sébastien Lecornu's brief resignation, President Emmanuel Macron reappointed him as Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼作为法国总理，向总统埃马纽埃尔·马克龙负责。
description.en: As Prime Minister of France, Sébastien Lecornu is responsible to President Emmanuel Macron.

description.zh-cn: 塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼接替弗朗索瓦·贝鲁出任法国总理。
description.en: Sébastien Lecornu succeeded François Bayrou as Prime Minister of France.

description.zh-cn: 在伊丽莎白·博尔内担任总理期间，塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼担任国防部长。
description.en: Sébastien Lecornu served as Minister of the Armed Forces during Élisabeth Borne's premiership.

description.zh-cn: 在加布里埃尔·阿塔尔担任总理期间，塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼担任国防部长。
description.en: Sébastien Lecornu served as Minister of the Armed Forces during Gabriel Attal's premiership.

description.zh-cn: 在米歇尔·巴尼耶担任总理期间，塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼担任国防部长。
description.en: Sébastien Lecornu served as Minister of the Armed Forces during Michel Barnier's premiership.

description.zh-cn: 在弗朗索瓦·贝鲁担任总理期间，塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼担任国防部长。
description.en: Sébastien Lecornu served as Minister of the Armed Forces during François Bayrou's premiership.

description.zh-cn: 塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼接替弗洛朗丝·帕利出任法国国防部长。
description.en: Sébastien Lecornu succeeded Florence Parly as Minister of the Armed Forces of France.

description.zh-cn: 布鲁诺·勒梅尔接替塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼出任法国国防部长。
description.en: Bruno Le Maire succeeded Sébastien Lecornu as Minister of the Armed Forces of France.

description.zh-cn: 塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼接替布鲁诺·勒梅尔再次出任法国国防部长。
description.en: Sébastien Lecornu succeeded Bruno Le Maire to once again become Minister of the Armed Forces of France.

description.zh-cn: 卡特琳·沃特兰接替塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼出任法国国防部长。
description.en: Catherine Vautrin succeeded Sébastien Lecornu as Minister of the Armed Forces of France.

description.zh-cn: 在让·卡斯泰担任总理期间，塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼担任海外部长。
description.en: Sébastien Lecornu served as Minister of Overseas France during Jean Castex's premiership.

description.zh-cn: 塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼接替安妮克·吉拉尔丹出任法国海外部长。
description.en: Sébastien Lecornu succeeded Annick Girardin as Minister of Overseas France.

description.zh-cn: 娅埃尔·布朗-皮韦接替塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼出任法国海外部长。
description.en: Yaël Braun-Pivet succeeded Sébastien Lecornu as Minister of Overseas France.

position.zh-cn: 领土发展部长、法国生态转型与国土协调部国务卿
position.en: Minister of Territorial Development, Secretary of State to the Minister for the Ecological and Inclusive Transition

description.zh-cn: 在爱德华·菲利普担任总理期间，塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼先后担任生态部国务卿和领土发展部长。
description.en: Sébastien Lecornu served as Secretary of State for Ecology and later as Minister of Territorial Development during Édouard Philippe's premiership.

description.zh-cn: 塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼接替让-米歇尔·贝莱出任领土发展部长。
description.en: Sébastien Lecornu succeeded Jean-Michel Baylet as Minister of Territorial Development.

description.zh-cn: 雅克利娜·古罗接替塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼出任领土发展部长。
description.en: Jacqueline Gourault succeeded Sébastien Lecornu as Minister of Territorial Development.

description.zh-cn: 埃玛纽埃勒·瓦贡接替塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼出任法国生态转型与国土协调部国务卿。
description.en: Emmanuelle Wargon succeeded Sébastien Lecornu as Secretary of State to the Minister for the Ecological and Inclusive Transition.

description.zh-cn: 塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼接替Jean-Louis Destans出任厄尔省省议会主席。
description.en: Sébastien Lecornu succeeded Jean-Louis Destans as President of the Departmental Council of Eure.

description.zh-cn: Pascal Lehongre接替塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼出任厄尔省省议会主席。
description.en: Pascal Lehongre succeeded Sébastien Lecornu as President of the Departmental Council of Eure.

description.zh-cn: 塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼接替Philippe Nguyen Thanh出任韦尔农市长。
description.en: Sébastien Lecornu succeeded Philippe Nguyen Thanh as Mayor of Vernon.

description.zh-cn: François Ouzilleau接替塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼出任韦尔农市长。
description.en: François Ouzilleau succeeded Sébastien Lecornu as Mayor of Vernon.

description.zh-cn: 法国国民议会未通过针对总理塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼的不信任案，使其得以继续任职。
description.en: The French National Assembly did not pass the motion of no confidence against Prime Minister Sébastien Lecornu, allowing him to remain in office.

description.zh-cn: 乌克兰授予塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔尼二等功绩勋章以表彰其贡献。
description.en: Ukraine awarded Sébastien Lecornu the Order of Merit, 2nd class, in recognition of his contributions.
